content.text: In the Netherlands, it's common to call ahead to reserve a table, especially for a 'borrel' (after-work drinks) on a Friday. Let's learn how to do that.

data.meaning: I would like to make a reservation

content.title: Request a Reservation
content.setting: You call a traditional Dutch pub ('bruin café') to reserve a table for drinks.

conversation_flow.title: State you want to make a reservation
conversation_flow.chatbot_message: Goedemiddag, met Café de Jordaan. Waarmee kan ik u helpen?

conversation_flow.title: Say it's for this Friday evening
conversation_flow.chatbot_message: Zeker. Voor welke dag en datum wilt u reserveren?

content.title: Provide the Details
content.setting: The host knows you want a table for Friday evening. Now you need to give more details.

conversation_flow.title: State the number of people
conversation_flow.chatbot_message: Oké, voor aanstaande vrijdagavond. Voor hoeveel personen is het?

conversation_flow.title: State the desired time
conversation_flow.chatbot_message: Vier personen, genoteerd. En hoe laat wilt u komen?

data.phrase: Welke tijden zijn er nog vrij?

content.title: Handling a Full Booking
content.setting: You've asked for a table at 7 PM. Let's see if it's available.

conversation_flow.title: React to the bad news
conversation_flow.chatbot_message: Even kijken... Nee, helaas. Om zeven uur zijn we helemaal volgeboekt.

conversation_flow.title: Ask for other available times
conversation_flow.chatbot_message: Ja, het is een drukke avond.

data.phrase: Is er om zes uur plek?
data.meaning: Is there a spot at six o'clock?

content.title: Suggesting Another Time
content.setting: You've asked about other available times. The host checks their book.

conversation_flow.title: Reject the suggested time
conversation_flow.chatbot_message: Ik heb nog wel een tafel om half tien (9:30).

content.title: Confirming the Reservation
content.setting: You've suggested 6 PM. The host is checking for you now.

conversation_flow.title: Confirm the 6 PM slot
conversation_flow.chatbot_message: Ja, om zes uur is er nog plek voor vier personen. Zal ik die voor u boeken?

conversation_flow.title: Give your name for the reservation
conversation_flow.chatbot_message: Uitstekend. Op welke naam mag de reservering?
